TextJPN: まだ６月だってのに…暑い。
TextENG: It's only June... but it's already so hot.

TextJPN: 外ではセミがミンミンと鳴き、夜は蚊まで出る。@k…これって完全に夏だよなぁ。
TextENG: I could hear the higurashi outside chirping ``miii miii,`` and at night, there are mosquitos.@k ...It might as well be summer already.

TextJPN: …朝だけは涼しいのが救いか。
TextENG: ...My only salvation was that the mornings were still cool.

TextJPN: 「暑いでございますわねぇ！」
TextENG: ``Summer, I do declare!``

TextJPN: 沙都子が気だるそうにスカートをバタバタさせている。
TextENG: Satoko was flapping her skirt languidly.

TextJPN: …はしたないぞ、おい。
TextENG: ...That's pretty unladylike there.

TextJPN: …ガキンチョとは言え、一応女の子なんだからさぁ。
TextENG: ...Even if she was a little brat, she still was a girl.

TextJPN: 「圭一さんはワイシャツ１枚で涼しそうですわねぇ…。羨ましいですわ」
TextENG: ``Keiichi does seem quite cool with just a single button-up shirt... I'm so jealous.``

TextJPN: 「俺から見りゃ、スカートの沙都子の方が涼しそうだよ。この時期のズボンがどれだけ暑いか、女のお前にゃわかるまい！」
TextENG: ``From how I see things, the skirt you're wearing looks like it would be much cooler. A girl like you wouldn't understand just how hot it is wearing jeans in this season!``
``...It... it gets hot... Hau...``

TextJPN: またこの娘は、妙な想像をたくましくさせてるな…。
TextENG: This girl has gone imagining something indecent...

TextJPN: 「レナの夏服は涼しそうな色合いがいいよな。見てるこっちも涼しくなる」
TextENG: ``Rena's summer clothes have a nice refreshing color. I feel cooler just looking at them.``

TextJPN: 「あはははは。ありがと！@k@vS20/02/440200022.　本当に涼しいんだよ」
TextENG: ``Ahahahaha. Thank you!@k@vS20/02/440200022. They really do feel pretty cool.``

TextJPN: 「私もレナさんみたいな涼しい夏服がよかったですわねぇ」
TextENG: ``I do wish my summer clothes were as breezy as Rena's.``

TextJPN: 「でも沙都子ちゃんの夏服、ワンピースですっごい可愛いし！　レナは沙都子ちゃんの夏服、着てみたいなー☆」
TextENG: ``But Satoko-chan, your summer clothes are so cute, being a one piece and all! I'd like to wear your summer clothes.☆``

TextJPN: 「これ、結構蒸しますわよ？　絶対にレナさんの方が涼しいですわぁ」
TextENG: ``This is actually quite stuffy, you know. I do believe what you're wearing would feel much cooler.``

TextJPN: 「でもかぁいい服の方がきっと楽しいよ。……はぅ！」
TextENG: ``But it would be so much more fun with kyute clothes... Hao!``

TextJPN: ……レナと沙都子では根本的に価値観が違う気がするぞ。
TextENG: ...I had a feeling that Rena and Satoko's base values were fundamentally different.

TextJPN: 「そう言えば…、この学校って指定の制服とかないんだよな」
TextENG: ``Speaking of which... our school doesn't have a uniform.``

TextJPN: 「うん。ないよ。@k@vS20/02/440200026.相応しい服であれば私服でも大丈夫なんだよ」
TextENG: ``Yeah. It doesn't.@k@vS20/02/440200026. As long as they're proper, then regular clothes are fine.``

TextJPN: 私服の生徒は確かに多い。制服を着ている生徒もいるが、みんなデザインは同じ、地味なものだ。
TextENG: There are quite a few students in regular clothes. There were a few wearing uniforms, but they were all the same design and rather plain.

TextJPN: 「…他の連中が着てる制服は何なんだよ。みんなお揃いだよな」
TextENG: ``...What's the uniform they're all wearing? They're all the same.``

TextJPN: 「あれは町の学校の制服なんですのよ。別に決まってるわけじゃないですけど、みんな着てますわね」
TextENG: ``That's the city school's uniform. It's not like there's a rule, but they're all wearing them.``

TextJPN: 「そこへ行くと、俺らの仲間はみんないろいろな制服を着てるよな。…わざわざどこかから取り寄せたのか？」
TextENG: ``Speaking of which, everybody in our group is wearing a different uniform, aren't we? Did you go out of your way to get them from somewhere?``

TextJPN: 「えぇ。魅音さんが調達して下さいますの」
TextENG: ``Why, yes. Mion-san supplied them.``

TextJPN: 「魅ぃちゃんの親類で、古着商をやってる人がいて、全国の学校の服を格安で仕入れてるんだって」
TextENG: ``Mii-chan's relative runs a secondhand clothing store. They can get school clothes from all over the country for cheap, they say.``

TextJPN: 「んで、その親類に頼んで、いろいろ個性的な制服を取り寄せてもらってるわけか」
TextENG: ``So you asked those relatives to get a bunch of unique school uniforms, then.``

TextJPN: …魅音のヤツ、仲間を着せ替え人形にして楽しんでるな、絶対。
TextENG: ...That Mion, she probably loves using her friends as dress-up dolls.

TextJPN: ………しかし変な古着屋だよな。
TextENG: ...That must be a strange secondhand clothing store.

TextJPN: 古着全般はわかるとして、全国の学校の服を仕入れてる？
TextENG: I get that it's a secondhand clothing store, but stocking clothes from schools all over the country?

TextJPN: …よくわからん古着屋だ。
TextENG: ...That's pretty strange for a secondhand clothing store.

TextJPN: 遠くの知らない学校の制服など、何の役にも立たないんじゃないのか？？
TextENG: What's the point in stocking up clothes from faraway schools they know nothing about??

TextJPN: 「…うん。それはレナも思うよ。他にも体操服とかスクール水着のお古とかも扱ってるの。@k@vS20/02/440200029.…そういうののお古はちょっと嫌だよねぇ」
TextENG: ``...Yeah. I think so, too. They also have used school swimsuits and P.E. uniforms...@k@vS20/02/440200029. I don't like the idea of having used ones.``

TextJPN: 「あんまり儲かってなさそうな商売だな。……きっと少しでも儲けさせるために、魅音が一肌脱いでやってるんだろうな」
TextENG: ``Doesn't sound like that shop makes much money... They probably have Mion pitch in and help so they can make a bit more.``

TextJPN: 「……でも、いつも魅音さんが自信満々に言いますのよ？　今にきっと大ブレイクしてすごい商売になる！！って」
TextENG: ``...But Mion-san says 'It'll be a big hit and become a great store!' with such conviction.``

TextJPN: ……学校制服の古着屋が大ブレイクねぇ？
TextENG: ...A secondhand clothing store that stocks school uniforms will be a big hit?

TextJPN: …わからん。
TextENG: ...I don't get it.
